text: The Third Day is a 1965 American suspense thriller movie directed by Jack Smight and based on the novel of the same name by Joseph Hayes. It stars George Peppard, Elizabeth Ashley, Roddy McDowall, Arthur O'Connell, Vincent Gardenia, Robert Webber, Herbert Marshall, Sally Kellerman and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * IMDB entry Category:1965 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jack Smight Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: The Third Day
